text:
You need to find the internal reference for the association between these 2 objects.

If you just need to get all custom object data to use:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/objects/custom-objects#retrieve-existing-custom-objects>
You should be able to retrieve all association data from custom object to other objects, and get the ID for the one you want to use to/from via this endpoint.
